title: MK Jogo/MK LoL/Mobaskins, Are They Bannable?
body: I haven't really used any of them yet, nor since I played a very long time ago, I've started to play again and I'm wondering if you can be banned for using the custom skin feature of them without getting your account banned.

replies.body: We don't support third party programs, and the ones you're asking about have been known to hide malicious content in the past.  Your best bet is to be super wary and consider if anything you're using might be perceived as causing an unfair advantage in-game.  Check out our[ third party guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848) for more info and stay safe!

What about jungle timers? From my understanding, they would just behave the same as the ones in game, therefore not giving any unfair advantage, apart from possibly typing a notification in chat (I think that was a thing at some point with one of those third party programs). What would I do if using these programs for custom skins did get me a ban? Talk to support about it or?
